thread.title: Mrs l e murphy
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Mrs l e murphy

author: Mrs l e murphy
title: Mrs l e murphy
text: We ordered several samples which were delivered within a couple of days. Once we decided which fabric we wanted we placed the order for three sets of blinds and were Quote: d 7 to 10 days for delivery. The blinds arrived within 7 days and we are delighted with the quality and ease of fitting.
